description: A Rados Block Device (RBD) mount that lasts the lifetime of a pod. RBD volumes support ownership management and SELinux relabeling.

fsType.description: Filesystem type of the volume to mount. Tip: Ensure that the filesystem type is supported by the host operating system.

keyring.description: The path to key ring for RBDUser.

readOnly.description: Force the disk to be mounted in read-only mode.

secretRef.description: The name of the authentication secret for RBDUser. If provided overrides `keyring`.
